text: One evening, as the journey in the "Endangered World" drew to a close...

The sound of an electric guitar echoed through the
encampment set up on a high ground overlooking a vast plain.

The closing phrase of the song [Player] and he had created,
intended as the last song to leave in this world
was played, and the performance ended.

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
Yeah! How's that, boss?!
I feel pretty good about it!

options.text: Yeah, it's the best!
Flawlessly perfect!
Well, it shall suffice!

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
YES!! If I could get those words out of you,
then it's a success, and just like that, it's finally finished!

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
Mhm mhm, it was a bit difficult, but I'm really happy with the results!
It was worth racking our brains over together!

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
If we blast this during the final showdown,
it's sure to be talked about for generations to come!!

options.text: The final showdown, huh..

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo (Traveler)
dialogue_after_selection.text: Oh? Are you perhaps getting nervous?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo (Traveler)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's o-kay, it's o-kay!!
Don't worry too much, you've got such dependable allies with you!

options.text: I can't wait for everyone to hear it!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo (Traveler)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Right?!
I can't wait either, I wonder what kind of feedback we'll get?!

options.text: I relied on you a lot, Danzo.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo (Traveler)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
N-No, no, what are you saying?!
[Player]-kun, you came up with the crucial parts, didn't you?!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo (Traveler)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I couldn't possibly have completed this song by myself,
it was only possible because it was a joint production!

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
Phew...
As expected, I've been playing guitar, singing,
and dancing non-stop, so I've worked up a sweat.

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
—Ah, the wind feels good!
Combined with the exhilaration of finishing a job, I feel absolutely amazing!!

After setting down his guitar, Danzo spread his arms and collapsed onto the grass.
A refreshing breeze caressed their skin.

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
Haah... Who knows it's been how many years since I've
been able to lie down on the grass feeling so calm.
It really is nice.

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
Every once in a while,
you really have to make time to properly relax.

options.text: Is it always that tense?
Do you not get time to relax?

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
Oh, boy!
In that other world, I live in a muddy vortex
where evil spirits run rampant!

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
You never know when or by whom you'll be attacked, right?
It really gave me a habit to hold my weapon even when I'm sleeping.

options.text: If it's a habit, why are you relaxed right now?
You're pretty defenseless right now...?

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
Eh? Well, you see...
-Now that you mention it, why is that?

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
Aww, the image of the perfect, mysterious Danzo-kun is ruined!
I'm such an idiot~!

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
Well, the biggest reason is probably that there aren't
any targets I should be wary of here—

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
Hmm... I guess there's a good chance
I just figure it's fine because it's you, boss?

The next moment after his playful display,
he calmly analyzed the situation, hand on his chin.
A typical Danzo move.

options.text: Because it's me...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo (Traveler)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Exactly.
Because you're the one I've exposed my inner self to, enough for you to observe this new form.

options.text: So this is what a relaxed Danzo is like.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo (Traveler)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course, my guard would be down.
You're someone who understands my inner self to the point of being able to observe this new form, right?

options.text: You're calculating something real big right now, aren't you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo (Traveler)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, as expected, you know me well!
...But this time, you're wrong.
What I was doing just now wasn't calculating, it was self-analysis.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo (Traveler)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, I did talk about myself enough for you to observe this new form, after all.
So it's natural, I guess.

text: Sighing, Danzo slowly sat up and turned his face towards [Player].

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
...You know, [Player]-kun.
I'm seriously grateful to you.

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
The trigger for me to remember what music means to me was,
of course, this world without music...

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
...But.
It's thanks to you that I was able to organize
my thoughts and find what I could do for this world.

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
That day,
you listened to my story on the rooftop,
and you observed me.

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
It's all because of that time we put our heads together,
and created a song worthy of the revival of music.

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
If that hadn't happened,
I probably would've never found the answer and
would've been stuck feeling frustrated the whole time.

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
Like—
I wouldn't have even finished a single song, you know.
Seriously, thank you.

options.text: There's nothing to thank me for.
You found the answer with your own strength, Danzo.
I was glad to get to know you deeply.

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
...Heheh, I look a bit embarrassing, don't I?
You're the first person I've ever talked to this much about my past and dreams.

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
Even in my original world, there's no one else who knows me this well, you know?
Maybe even more than my master?

After saying that much, Danzo looked up at the starry sky.
The eyes displayed on his screen narrowed.

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
...Ah, I see.
You've become that significant of a presence to me.

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
I had never truly realized it.
Learning that... might be a valuable lesson from this journey too.

options.text: What am I to you, Danzo?
I want to hear that answer.
What do you mean...?

text:
Just as [Player] reacted to Danzo's muttered words-
that was the moment.

options.text: Whoa...!?

text:
Danzo pulled [Player] firmly towards him,
holding them against his chest.

They fell onto the grass, on top of each other.
[Player] could feel Danzo's body heat directly.

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
—If I tell you that, there'll be no turning back.
...Are you sure?

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
Think carefully, okay?
The fact that I've talked about myself so deeply,
just because you asked...

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
It's proof that I want to know about you just as much.
...Even down to every last detail, you know.

Danzo, whispering in a low voice, reached his hand towards the collar of [Player]'s jacket.
He began to strip it off, from the shoulder down to the elbow.

options.text: W-wait, wait...!!
Eh, so we are doing this now!?
(Resolve yourself and accept)

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text: ...Just kidding. Just a joke.
Danzo put the jacket back on and pulled away while helping [Player] up.

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
That got your heart racing, didn't it?
...Ah, please don't sue me for harassment later, okay?

options.text: That seriously gave me a heart attack!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo (Traveler)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ahahaha, sorry, sorry!
A mischievous urge just sprouted, please forgive me!

options.text: Why do you tease like that!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo (Traveler)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ahahaha, sorry, sorry!
A mischievous urge just sprouted, please forgive me!

options.text: You made me get my hopes up!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo (Traveler)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ahahaha, sorry, sorry!
A mischievous urge just sprouted, please forgive me!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo (Traveler)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...But, I didn't say I wouldn't live up to your expectations, did I?
If that's what you're feeling right now...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo (Traveler)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
There's no need to hold back anymore, right?
Once I get going, I can't put on the brakes, so be prepared.

note: [This choice will only be available if you picked Option 3]

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
—So then, a sincere apology,
my thanks for everything so far,
and a little service.

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
Let's be even more open, more free!
I'll deliver you an impromptu personal live performance!
Danzo laughed, then reached for his coat and hat and began to take them off.

He then stripped off his shirt as well—
and in a shirtless state, he held his guitar.

options.text: D-Danzo!?
He actually took it off!?

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
—Haha, maximum liberation!
Giving into this feeling of freedom,
I'll pour all sorts of emotions into this performance!

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
So... listen carefully, okay?
I've exposed my body's scars—
a ninja's shame...

name: Danzo (Traveler)
text:
I'm more serious than usual, you get me?
What I'm about to deliver is a song just for you,
that you can only hear here.

The song Danzo began to play was very gentle-
a somewhat melancholic melody.

A piece woven by the calm strumming of the guitar,
fitting for a sky full of stars.

That day, [Player]—
indeed heard the feelings Danzo always kept hidden.
